HeaderText2: to monitor the educational development of each child within Montessori schools.
OurTeam:
Our mission is to support the education of future generations by providing the resources needed to face the future with confidence. To do this, we created Sori Connect, an innovative digital tool designed for Montessori schools.

This platform allows to accurately monitor the educational development of each child, while providing schools, educators, and parents with easy access to essential information about their educational journey.
OurMission: Smooth cooperation for monitoring harmonious pedagogy between
EducatorsText: a tool that simplifies personalized monitoring, allowing detailed attention to each stage of the child's development.
DirectorsText: A tool offering a global vision of the progress of each student and allowing enriching comparisons with other Montessori schools
ParentText: a digital school notebook allowing them to follow their child's progress in detail and to facilitate communication with the teaching team.
Service1Text: Our digital tool is designed specifically for Montessori schools, allowing you to document and monitor in a precise and adapted manner the unique educational methods of this pedagogy.
Service2Text: Our platform ease there comparison of each child's progress with the standards of the national curriculum, assuring parents that Montessori education meets official educational criteria and promotes harmonious integration with the general education system
